snippet: Stocks opened higher after a stronger-than-expected payroll report signaled hope for a lackluster economy, but early gains in share prices quickly faded.
abstract: Stocks open higher after a stronger-than-expected payroll report signals hope for a lackluster economy, but early gains in share prices quickly fade as details about the costs of Hurricane Sandy begin to emerge.
lead_paragraph: Stocks opened higher after a stronger-than-expected payroll report signaled hope for a lackluster economy, but early gains in share prices quickly faded.

headline.main: Rising Estimates of Costs Of Storm Weigh on Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Rising Estimates of Costs Of Storm Weigh on Wall St.
